title: Dressed to Suppress
lyrics:
And we keep speeding
And we keep speeding
And we keep crashing
And we keep crashing
And we keep reaching
And we keep reaching

And we keep crying

'til we start laughing



Long before my fall from grace

For a piece of me they appear

From the throat I talk to you

All of us, we're cracked in two



And the ones in the back cry wait for me

And the ones in the front cry you're too slow, you're too slow

And the ones that are weak cry carry me

And the ones who are strong cry let me go, let me go



We reach for the things we idolize

Other things are just for show

Her beauty is a form of charity

Dressed to suppress all kinds of sorrow



Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress all kinds of sorrow

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress all kinds of sorrow



(na na na na na)



Long before my fall from grace

For a piece of me they appear

From the throat I talk to you

All of us, we're cracked in two



And the ones that crawl back onto me

Are the ones who don't wanna give me space, give me space

And the ones that run away from me

Are the ones that are blessed and love the chase, love the chase



We reach for the things we idolize

Other things are just for show

Her beauty is a form of charity

Dressed to suppress all kinds of sorrow



Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress all kinds of sorrow

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress all kinds of sorrow

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress all kinds of sorrow

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress

Dressed to suppress all kinds of sorrow



And we keep speeding

And we keep speeding

(na na na na na)

And we keep crashing

And we keep crashing

(na na na na na)

And we keep reaching

And we keep reaching

(na na na na na)

And we keep crying

'til we start laughing
